page.title: 07Agriculture Part 3
page.content: {A typical working day}starts at 5.30 with the first milking. This takes 2.5hours.32 cows are milked at a time. The number of cows varies according to how many are then dry.The milk is stored in two bulk tanks holding,in all,4342 litres which is collected daily by the Milk Marketing Board.Two milkings take place to give this daily total.Between 8am.and 2.30pm.all the daily chores are completed,breakfast and lunch eaten and according to the day and the season activities such as silaging,hay-making,attending markets etc.are undertaken.After the 2nd.milk -king,again according to season,fenc- ing,ditching,harvesting etc.are done by the farmer,his sons and 5 workmen. The workmen finish at a set time and any unfinished work is completed,usu- ally,by the farmer and his sons.At bus -y times overtime is worked by the men
